attributes.action: Doctors to be imprisoned for misprescribing antibiotics
attributes.additional_details:
I submitted my petition about 6 weeks ago, but have heard nothing since?
Did something go wrong?
I have not received a confirmation email - not even in my junk folder.
Please resend it or whatever's required.

rejection.details:
Good afternoon.
your original e-petition was never received.  Could you please re-submit this and select the Dept of Health.

Many thanks
